name: The Next Subject
description:
The Next Subject is a first person platformer about being replaced by the next one, no matter how hard you try.

Your goal is to reach to the exit in the given time, and the system won't care if you can't.

NOTE: Build at the jam submission time is labelled accordingly. The future balancing/fixes will come to the main build. Play the Windows executable for the best experience

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Space: Jump

Mouse1: Interact

Mouse2: Kill yourself

I: Invert vertical mouse axis

J/K: Decrease/increase mouse sensitivity

CREDITS:
